can anyone help me with cgwd?
when I start cgwd I get errors like these: ** (cgwd:2230): WARNING **: Cannot open pixmap: shade
and make sure that your refresh rates are set right
put "1280x1024" in front of ALL of them
make sure default is set to 24
then restart X : ctrl alt X
